parameters.description:
=This tool is used to look up the following information.
Each tool requires different input fields.
Fill in only the specified fields; All other fields fill in 0.
Your task is to determine which tool to use based on the input information provided
Please provide complete information.
1. Lottery result lookup:
 - Required fields: region, date
 - All other fields fill in 0
2. Traffic violations & other violations:
 - Required fields: bienso (license plate), type (vehicle type)
 - All other fields fill in 0
3. Vehicle registration (Inspection):
 - Required fields: bienso (license plate), temdk (registration code)
 - All other fields fill in 0
4. Lunar calendar, solar calendar lookup:
 - If only asking about lunar calendar, solar calendar
  + Required fields: vannien (date), type (lunar to solar calendar or solar to lunar calendar).
  + All other fields fill in 0
 - If you need details about the Good Hour, Bad Hour, Five Elements (Trach Nhat), Truc Ngay, Tuoi xung khac, Ngoc hap thong thu, Xuat hanh, Xuat hanh theo Khong Minh, Xuat hanh theo Ly Thuan Phong.
  + Required fields: vannien, chitiet, type.
  + All other fields fill in 0
5. Weather
 - If you only ask about the province.
  + Required field: province.
  + All other fields fill in 0
 - If you need about the district/county
  + Required fields: province/city, district/town
  + All other fields fill in 0
6. youtube
 - Required field: video (search keyword).
 - All other fields fill in 0

parameters.query:
WITH ranked AS (
  SELECT 
    title,
    link,
    contentSnippet,
    isodate AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh' AS vn_time,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      PARTITION BY
        CASE
          WHEN link LIKE 'https://vnexpress.net%' THEN 'vnexpress.net'
          WHEN link LIKE 'https://dantri.com.vn%' THEN 'dantri.com.vn'
          WHEN link LIKE 'https://thanhnien.vn%' THEN 'thanhnien.vn'
        END
      ORDER BY isodate DESC
    ) AS rn
  FROM vnnew
  WHERE link LIKE 'https://vnexpress.net%'
     OR link LIKE 'https://dantri.com.vn%'
     OR link LIKE 'https://thanhnien.vn%'
)
SELECT title, link, contentSnippet, vn_time
FROM ranked
WHERE rn <= 5
ORDER BY vn_time DESC;
